data.description: Manipulate SMS PDB files for PalmOS
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wrote Palm::SMS on top of Palm::Raw to extend Palm::PDB module
    (both from Andrew Arensburger's p5-Palm-1.3.0 package) as explained
    by Andrew himself.

    I'd like that Palm::SMS (which just entered CPAN) would end up into
    Palm::PDB's category.

    Thanks,

    -- Lorenzo Cappelletti lorenzo.cappelletti@email.it
